title: Socialnetwork
author: Socialnetwork
content: TokenMarketCap is a website used to track the prices, volumes, and other relevant data of coins in the cryptocurrency market. The site is designed to help users learn about coins, compare their prices, and conduct analysis. It is also used to promote coin projects to a wider audience. Since Tokenmarketcap.org is a very popular site in the cryptocurrency world, listing coins on this site often leads to increased visibility and engagement with potential investors.WEB SITE: https://www.tokenmarketcap.orgWEBSITE (2) : https://www.tokenmarketcap.netTWİTTER: https://www.twitter.com/tokenmarketcap_ TELEGRAM: https://t.me/tokenmarketcaporg TELEGRAM CONTACT: https://t.me/tokentmcMobile application: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tokenmarketcap.apwfo&gl&pcampaignid=pcampaignidMKT-Other-global-all-co-prtnr-py-PartBadge-Mar2515-1Google News: https://news.google.com/publications/CAAqBwgKMLClsgswvcDJAw/sections/CAQqEAgAKgcICjCwpbILML3AyQMwmqLABw?ceid=EN:en&oc=3&hl=en&gl=ENI can get started right away!Dear valued readers,Are you interested in taking your coin project to the next level and increasing its visibility? If so, we have an amazing offer for you!We can help you get your coin listed on tokenmarketcap.org, the leading platform for tracking cryptocurrency prices and market capitalizations. With our services, you'll have access to an unlimited period of listing on tokenmarketcap.org, which will increase your coin's exposure to potential investors and traders.What's even better is that we offer a risk-free solution. You only pay after the work is done, so you can rest assured that you're getting exactly what you paid for. This offer is too good to pass up, and you won't find a better deal anywhere else.But that's not all! In addition to the tokenmarketcap.org listing, we'll also list your coin on our mobile app, available on the Google Play store. This listing will be available for an unlimited time period and will increase your visibility even further. Our app is designed to make it easy for investors and traders to access the latest information on cryptocurrency prices and market capitalizations.Once your coin is listed on our site and mobile app, it'll also be automatically listed on Google News, which will bring even more exposure to your coin. You can't afford to miss out on this opportunity to increase your coin's visibility and reach a wider audience.And the best part? All of this comes at a one-time fee of only $50! It's an incredibly low price for such a valuable service that will benefit your coin project for an unlimited time period.Don't wait any longer to take advantage of this incredible offer. Contact us today to get started and take your coin project to the next level!Modify message

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I think this is your second thread here in this forum,  I guess you had to create a new thread and abandon your first thread because some users called you out for your poor web designs and also for accepting different projects  without having to scrutinize those project thoroughly. Now that you have created a new thread how many of the previous suggestion did you take into play? Because from the look of things you didn't work on your web design it's still looks as shitty as before, and I haven't checked the projects that are currently listed in your website but with your Op I think you're still accepting any projects that comes to you with the $50 fee. That's not good as it will only lead to you listing scam coins in your website.

comments.author: Socialnetwork
comments.body: Thank you for your feedback. You are correct that I had to create a new thread due to some users' concerns about my web design and project vetting process. I take all feedback seriously and have worked to improve my services based on the feedback I have received.Regarding web design, I have made several improvements to my website since my previous thread, including updating the layout, color scheme, and user interface. I understand that design is subjective, but I am always open to feedback on how I can further improve the website's appearance and usability.As for project vetting, I assure you that I do thoroughly research and analyze every project before listing it on my site. I also have a strict policy against listing scam coins and only accept projects that meet certain criteria. I take my responsibility to my users very seriously and strive to provide the most accurate and up-to-date information possible.I appreciate your feedback and will continue to work on improving my services.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: I'd recommend moving your thread over to the Altcoins > Service Announcements board, considering that it is not a project that directly focuses on using Bitcoin or adding any value to the Bitcoin ecosystem. Another suggestion is to first focus on richer data, rather than selling out to projects seeking to pay for attention. Create a reason for people to visit your site and digest its content before trying to monetize it, not the other way around. You'll gain frustration and grow tired of your project quickly if your approach is to try and use a new website as a means of advertising, without having any user base.Good luck with your project

comments.author: tinyteapot
comments.body: Just a quick note on your beautiful website.Cryptocurrency industry now needs more trust than before, charging for token listing may discredit your website, it's easier to conclude that the trending proceed can also be bought with money.It's obvious you spent some money developing the APIs for the website, you already monetized it with ads, your returns on investment shall be recovered over some period of time so far you have people visiting the website.This is a piece of advise and it's not compulsory to take and I apologize in advance in case you pick an offense

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: I went through the website and as a developer, here are some things that I want to suggest that you should take care of before advertising.1. Images are loading very slowly which means they are not optimized at all. You can google how to optimize the images to reduce loading time.2. Your logo on the top left looks really cartoonish for a project which is based on investment, that targets the audience of age above 18 mostly.3. The color scheme is very silly and looks very dull, maybe you need a UI designer all over again?TBH we don't need any more solutions to the problems which are already solved.- https://coinmarketcap.com- https://www.coingecko.comThese are already good enough and no point in future I see where your project will overtake these, maybe an option is to start listing shitcoins and then they promote it for you? wastage of time and money overall.Good luck with the project.

comments.author: pingu39
comments.body: Why you not try with Crypto fundraising platform.One of them is INDIEGOGO , Website :https://www.indiegogo.comIndiegogo is Crowdfunding platform where you can donate money, Bitcoin, or more cryptocurrencies to support ideas.Some of them are listed here:https://bitcoinke.io/2022/04/top-10-platforms-for-crowdfunding-in-crypto/

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: ImThour on April 12, 2023, 10:19:39 AMTBH we don't need any more solutions to the problems which are already solved.- https://coinmarketcap.com- https://www.coingecko.comThese are already good enough and no point in future I see where your project will overtake these, maybe an option is to start listing shitcoins and then they promote it for you? wastage of time and money overall.Good luck with the project.  I agree with some of your points this is a good platform for shitcoin to gain visibility because they are going to be listed here for the life of this website, there are no parameters, no requirements, just pay to get listed even if a token has no volume, a clear shitcoin no wonder your platform is full of shitcoins.Quote⭐How to get listed on TokenMarketCap?To list your coin on our site for an unlimited period of time, you must pay $50 . Payment is made only once and your listing remains for life.I don't think any investors will use this platform for lack of great features that can help investors and traders, I'll still go for the two top market aggregators.
